price: 6. Oh yo moto! Ozali koyika mpiko тропа Nkolo nayo ntango nyoso yeba ete okokutana naye.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan famulāqīhi
